'''''Leaf by Niggle''''' is the first separate reprint of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s short story "[[Leaf by Niggle]]". The publication features a foreword by Alonzo L. McDonald and a four page discussion guide at rear.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?topic_id=1817&forum=15&post_id=11509#forumpost11509|articlename=Interesting eBay Auctions|dated=|website=Guide|accessed=27 January 2013}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.amazon.com/Leaf-By-Niggle-Story-Trinity/dp/B004R6IS7K%3FSubscriptionId%3D02853F55TG1050FAZ582%26tag%3Dredconceptual-20%26linkCode%3Dxm2%26camp%3D2025%26creative%3D165953%26creativeASIN%3DB004R6IS7K|articlename=Leaf By Niggle: A Story (Trinity Forum)|dated=|website=AM|accessed=27 January 2013}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.ebay.com/itm/Leaf-by-Niggle-A-Story-by-J-R-R-Tolkien-1st-Separate-Book-Publication-2003-/221181607960?pt=Antiquarian_Collectible&hash=item337f738018&nma=true&si=0aeD7obRN%252B86zACv5fFZ5Tw9s1s%253D&orig_cvip=true&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2557|articlename=Leaf by Niggle: A Story by J.R.R. Tolkien ~ 1st Separate Book Publication (item number 221181607960)|dated=|website=[http://www.ebay.com eBay.com]|accessed=27 january 2013}}</ref>
